text: Valley of Hamon-Gog, a phrase from Ezekiel 39:15, literally means "Valley of the multitudes of Gog". It is to be the place where all of Israel buries the five-sixths of the army of Gog and Magog that are struck down by God.Orr, James, M.A., D.D. General Editor. Entry for HAMON-GOG. International Standard Bible Encyclopedia 1915: Retrieved on 16 March 2013 ==See also== * Baal-hamon and Ba`al Hammon * Ezekiel 39 ==References== Category:Hebrew Bible valleys Category:Gog and Magog
title: Valley of Hamon-Gog
